name: the office duck deserves a NAP
name_original: the office duck deserves a NAP
description:
The office duck has been working hard answering emails and deserves a little nap. Help him create distractions for the boss and safely nap the rest of the work day away.

Warning: If you don't create enough distractions, the boss will find you.

See a bug or have any questions? Find me on twitter!
